LanguageData.FALCHM.OverrideVanillaOverlayDesc: Use Heat Map's overlay instead of the vanilla overlay. (default: {default})
LanguageData.FALCHM.ShowIndoorsOnlyDesc: Only show the overlay for indoors areas. (default: {default})
LanguageData.FALCHM.OverlayOpacityDesc: Reduce this value to make the overlay more transparent. (default: {default}%)
LanguageData.FALCHM.UpdateDelayDesc: Number of ticks delay between widget and temperature text updates while game is unpaused. Lower numbers provide smoother updates, but may affect performance on low end machines. (default: {default})
LanguageData.FALCHM.ShowOutDoorThermometerDesc: Displays a widget in the top right hand corner of the UI showing current outdoor temperature. (default: {default})
LanguageData.FALCHM.ThermometerOpacityDesc: Reduce this value to make the outdoor temperature thermometer background color more transparent. (default: {default}%)
LanguageData.FALCHM.ThermometerFixedDesc: Locks the thermometer widget in place, disabling shift-click dragging. (default: {default})
LanguageData.FALCHM.ThermometerRightDesc: Changes the margin between the thermometer widget and the right of the screen. The widget can be dragged using shift-click while ingame. (default: {default})
LanguageData.FALCHM.ThermometerTopDesc: Changes the margin between the thermometer widget and the top of the screen. The widget can be dragged using shift-click while ingame. (default: {default})
LanguageData.FALCHM.ShowTemperatureOverRoomsDesc: When overlay is on, this will also display the room temperature over the centre of the room. (default: {default})
LanguageData.FALCHM.UseCustomeRangeDesc:
When off, the colour gradient automatically maps to the human comfort range as defined by the game.
When on, allows you to set a custom boundary for the blue and red ends of the gradient, in current temperature units (default: {default})
LanguageData.FALCHM.CustomRangeMinDesc: Blue end of gradient. Temperatures below this will be blue. Use current temperature units
LanguageData.FALCHM.CustomRangeMaxDesc: Red end of gradient. Temperatures above this will be red. Use current temperature units
LanguageData.FALCHM.ThermometerTooltip: Outdoor temperature. Click to toggle heat map overlay. Shift-click and drag to move the widget, the position can be locked in the mod settings. This widget can be disabled in mod settings.
